SELECT hk.kind_name, ifnull(s.apply_qty,0),ifnull(s.send_qty,0), IFNULL(vd.qty, 0) AS store_qty, hg.code, IFNULL(s.apply_qty * s.price, 0) AS je, hg.goods_name, hg.goods_gg, hg.packeage, hg.mfrs_id, hg.prov_id, hg.unit, b.cname AS provName, bm.mfrs_name AS mfrsName, s.*, m.fill_date, dg.is_packet, dg.packet_code, dg.req_num FROM dept_buy_sub s LEFT JOIN hos_goods_info hg ON hg.id = s.goods_id LEFT JOIN v_stockpile_hz_dept vd ON s.goods_id = vd.hos_goods_id AND s.buy_dept_id = vd.dept_id LEFT JOIN bas_company_info b ON b.id = hg.prov_id LEFT JOIN bas_mfrs_info bm ON bm.id = hg.mfrs_id LEFT JOIN dept_buy_main m ON m.bill_id = s.bill_id and m.if_closed =0 LEFT JOIN dept_goods_info dg ON dg.goods_id = s.goods_id AND dg.dept_id = s.buy_dept_id LEFT JOIN hos_kindcode hk on hk.id = hg.lbsx
s.bill_id = (select m.id from dept_buy_main m where m.id =(select o.source_bill_id from out_stock o where o.id=#{id}))
